name: Rep. Chris Stewart

A: "Absolutely. I can promise you that it will be uninterrupted."

tweet_text:

name: Rep. Chris Stewart
tweet_text: Though we have always maintained a very small footprint in Syria, we have had a huge impact on humanitarian, political and military objectives.  Most troubling, if we withdraw, we leave our allies exposed and in a weakened position.
